url: Add an api key '--bc-api-key <api-key>' to see more detailed insights via https://bridgecrew.cloud

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure From Alias are unique for multistage builds.
code_block:
FROM ubuntu:22.04
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends curl ca-certificates \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
RUN useradd -m appuser
RUN curl -sSLo /tmp/install.sh https://example.com/install.sh \
    && /bin/sh /tmp/install.sh
USER appuser
CMD ["bash"]

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure the base image uses a non latest version tag
code_block: FROM ubuntu:22.04

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure the last USER is not root
code_block: USER appuser

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure that APT isn't used
code_block:
FROM ubuntu:22.04
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends curl ca-certificates \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
RUN useradd -m appuser
RUN curl -sSLo /tmp/install.sh https://example.com/install.sh \
    && /bin/sh /tmp/install.sh
USER appuser
CMD ["bash"]

code_block:
FROM ubuntu:22.04
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends curl ca-certificates \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
RUN useradd -m appuser
RUN curl -sSLo /tmp/install.sh https://example.com/install.sh \
    && /bin/sh /tmp/install.sh
USER appuser
CMD ["bash"]
